intro: Gardenia fusca, commonly known as the dark gardenia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of Africa, particularly South Africa. The plant is characterized by its dark green, leathery leaves and clusters of fragrant, white flowers. It thrives in shaded, humid environments and is often found in forest understories. The fruit is a small, round drupe that contains a single seed.
